pages.text: $(li)Llamas are neutral animals that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/savanna)Savannas$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/leather)Leather$(/l) upon death.$(br)$(li)Llamas can be tamed by repetively riding them until hearts are displayed.$(br)$(li)Tamed Llamas can be bred feeding them with $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/hay_bale)Hay Bales$(/l).
Don't hurt a Llama, or it will not stop spitting on you.
$(li)You can equip your tamed Llama with carpets of any colour.
$(li)Just shift right click in your tamed Llama to open its inventory and equip it with the desired carpet.
